name: Silence on the Line
description:
What is Silence on the Line?

Silence on the Line is a survival horror game that was developed during Global Game Jam 2013. In the game, the player finds themselves alone on a submarine where they are being hunted by deadly spirits.

Instructions

  • Mouse to Look
  • WASD Keys to Move
  • Press the 'F' Key to Toggle the Flashlight
  • Press the 'Escape' Key to Quit

* Headphones are strongly recommended.

Credits

  • Brian Cice - Character Design & Sound Design
  • Christian Plummer - Programming & Level Design
  • Daniel Jung - Programming & Technical Design
  • Dylan Mahoney - Art
  • Dysheed Goodson - Play Testing
  • Keith Maggio - Programming & Technical Design
  • Moises Carreras - Programming & Technical Design
  • Travis Carter - Art & Level Design
  • Travis Wolfe - Sound Design
  • Zenas Prime - Programming & Technical Design
